mapper.select: select `id`,`number`,`day`,`people`,`remarks`,`goodstype`,`classtypes`,`num`,`name`,`goods_num`,`goods_name`,`mfrsnum`,`mfrsname`,`brandnum`,`brandname`,`factory`,`old_price`,`new_price`,`flag` from all_retailprice where id = #{value}
mapper.delete:
delete from all_retailprice where id in
#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT count( 0 ) FROM ( select m.mfrsname,b.brandname,b.goodsid,a.mfrsid,a.brandnum,a.retail_price,a.classtype from c_brand b join aa_produca a on a.brandnum=b.brandnum AND a.mfrsid=b.mfrsid join c_mfrs m on m.mfrsnum=b.mfrsid
and m.mfrsname = #{mfrsname} and b.brandname = #{brandname} and a.state=1 and m.xsstate=0 and m.state=1 and b.xsstate=0 and b.state=1
GROUP BY b.brandnum , b.mfrsid,a.retail_price order by b.brandid desc,a.id ) AS temp

SELECT count( 0 ) FROM ( select m.mfrsname,b.brandname,b.goodsid,a.mfrsid,a.brandnum,a.retail_price,a.classtype from c_brand b join aa_parts a on a.brandnum=b.brandnum AND a.mfrsid=b.mfrsid join c_mfrs m on m.mfrsnum=b.mfrsid
and m.mfrsname = #{mfrsname} and b.brandname = #{brandname} and a.state=1 and m.xsstate=0 and m.state=1 and b.xsstate=0 and b.state=1
GROUP BY b.brandnum , b.mfrsid,a.retail_price order by b.brandid desc,a.id ) AS temp

SELECT count( 0 ) FROM ( select m.mfrsname,b.brandname,b.goodsid,a.mfrsid,a.brandnum,a.retail_price ,a.classtype from c_brand b join aa_jpcp a on a.brandnum=b.brandnum AND a.mfrsid=b.mfrsid join c_mfrs m on m.mfrsnum=b.mfrsid
and m.mfrsname = #{mfrsname} and b.brandname = #{brandname} and a.state=1 and m.xsstate=0 and m.state=1 and b.xsstate=0 and b.state=1
GROUP BY b.brandnum , b.mfrsid,a.retail_price order by b.brandid desc,a.id ) AS temp

GROUP BY b.brandnum , b.mfrsid,a.retail_price order by b.brandid desc,a.id ) AS temp
